system.description: Commonly referred to “Vit Stick” on the mean streets.Fixes all them boo-boos, regaining [[/roll 1D4+2]] Hit Points, but every dose has a 5% cumulative chance of addiction (1ST DOSE 5%, 2ND DOSE 10%, 3RD DOES 15%. ETC). If addicted, you can only be healed by vitality sticks. No long rest or magic can help you.
